fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer

Interface MessagingConfigurer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configurer<MessagingBuilder>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SpringMessagingConfigurer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCloudhopperConfigurer, DefaultFreemarkerEmailConfigurer, DefaultFreemarkerSmsConfigurer, DefaultJavaMailConfigurer, DefaultMessagingConfigurer, DefaultOvhSmsConfigurer, DefaultSendGridConfigurer, DefaultThymeleafEmailConfigurer, DefaultThymeleafSmsConfigurer, FreeMarkerConfigurer, MessagingConfigurerAdapter, NoTemplateEngineConfigurer, SpringCloudhopperConfigurer, SpringEnvironmentConfigurer, SpringMailConfigurer, SpringOvhSmsConfigurer, SpringSendGridConfigurer, ThymeLeafConfigurer

    public interface MessagingConfigurer
extends Configurer<MessagingBuilder>
    Specialized interface of Configurer generic interface. This interface is designed to configure a MessagingBuilder instance. MessagingBuilders are used to instantiate a MessagingService. MessagingBuilder has static factory methods to provide predefined behaviors. To explicitly target a factory method, MessagingConfigurer implementations can be annotated by a ConfigurerFor annotation.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
